description: Paddle along the Dortmund-Ems Canal and enjoy the warm summer breeze at sunset.

locationInfo.description: A peaceful canoeing experience along one of Münster’s most scenic waterways.

activity: Lush Green Walk in Hiltruper See
description: A refreshing nature walk around the tranquil Hiltruper See, perfect for a hot day.
groupSuitability: Best for couples who love nature

locationInfo.description: A shaded walking path around the beautiful Hiltruper Lake.

activity: Picnic and Relaxation at Wienburg Park
description: Enjoy a laid-back afternoon with a picnic and relaxation under the shade of large trees.

locationInfo.description: A quiet and green park with open meadows and shaded picnic spots.
safetyTips: Find a shaded spot to avoid direct sun.

description: A calming yoga session in the lush green surroundings of Schlossgarten Münster.
groupSuitability: Best for two people looking for relaxation

locationInfo.description: A beautiful green space near Münster Castle, ideal for peaceful outdoor activities.
safetyTips: Use a yoga mat for comfort.

activity: Evening Bike Ride through Loddenheide Park
description: An easy cycling route through the peaceful and modern Loddenheide Park.

locationInfo.description: A smooth cycling trail through the business park and green spaces of Loddenheide.
safetyTips: Wear a helmet and cycling gloves.
Avoid riding in peak sun hours.
